description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for an Event Form Dialog. It provides a user interface for creating or editing events, including input fields for title, description, date, time, all-day toggle, and reminder settings. It interacts with an EventProvider for state management and handles form validation and user input.

classes.name: EventFormDialog
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that provides a dialog for creating or editing an event.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, returning an instance of _EventFormDialogState.
